literals: 'Oh My Goodness! You are only 5 years old! and you wanna know HTML?'
"Okay, So HTML Stands for Hyper Text Markup Language! But lets not worry about this big word"
"Now I'll do something for you, but lets first you cute little thing tell me whats your name ?"
"Now Lets check this Cool thing I'm opening here..."
"Do you see your name there? What? No?"
"Okay I am Opening something where you'll see some bla bla texts.."
"Look theres written Dora the explorer there, lets change it your name. You know you have a good cool name. Lets write it down here."
"Now lets check the page with the Ugly naked guy again!"
"can you see your name there now?"
"You know its called a Header in html, grown ups write some big texts here!"
"Oho! Everything is great but you don't have to be naked for that. Lets dress up, shall we?"
"Now lets again check that stupid file with lots of bla bla texts in it"
"Do you see NAKED Guy written on somewhere? Can you see it? You found it? Yaaai!!"
"Now lets change it to DRESSED Guy"
"Yep! this looks better! You are a Smart kid!"
"Now what you just did is how we change pictures in HTML"
"Well since we are actually doing many cool stuffs! so that 'Keep calm and Do Nothing' phrase is little awkward. don't you think so?"
"Now lets change it like you changed your name, Come on you can do it, I'm opening the same thing for you, its called an Editor, here you can write html codes"
"Now lets change the text to Keep calm and do Coding"
"This portion of the code is called the Body you know! Body of the code!"
"Now lets make the fonts look little bit bigger"
"can you see there written font size?"
"Change the value next to the font size 160 to 200 now"
"This thing just you did is called Styling. You know every cool kid likes fashion, our html too is cool. he likes styles. and it is called CSS"
comments: This script is built as a prototype during Mozilla HelloWeb Hackathon Kolkata 2016
An Interactive Artificial Intelligence with a friendly personality to teach 5 year olds about HTML and WEB
